revised_title: Revisiting the Structure of Striated Muscle Fibers
tldr: The author examines the structure of striated muscle fibers and proposes that the striations are the optical expression of a double spiral membrane (double helicoid) traversing the length of the fiber. This discovery challenges the widely accepted view that the striations are a succession of transverse discs within the muscle fibers.
